name: Fique Vivo - Protect your heart
description:
The player needs to protect his heart by creating white and red blood cells to eliminate the bacteria that are attacking the heart.

Protect your heart! Your body is infected, bacteria are attacking the heart! Defend your heart!

Controlling the mouse, the player will create blood cells to fight viruses.

Keep it Alive  - Ludum Dare # 46 - April/2020

#LudumDare

#LudumDare46
